overview: Greg has over fifteen years of high technology experience in Silicon Valley. Most recently, Greg spent over four years at Google and ran the sales customer analytics group within product marketing. Greg holds an MBA from the UCLA Anderson School of Management, and MA in Education from Stanford University. Greg also holds a bachelor’s degree in Economics and Systems Science from UCLA. Prior to joining Google, Greg was a Senior Marketing Manager at Oracle Corporation. Greg also was a co-founder of ShoppingList.com, and VP of Marketing at ConsumerReview.com. He also started and headed up market research efforts at PointCast and Symantec Corporation. In addition to work, Greg’s other passions are his family, golf, and contemporary architecture.
